entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow becoming mixed with ice pellets early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
